title: About CfCbazar?
content: Youe marketplace for smart deals, DIY, music, games & the WorkToken.

title: How our speed test works?
content: Check the details of our speed test.

title: How to play games?
content: You can play free games by visiting https://cc.free.bg/games.html. You can play premium games by visiting https://cfcbazar.ct.ws, sing in/register then press games from the list om the middle of the page.

title: How to earn WorkTokens?
content: You can earn WorkTokens by contributing to CfCbazar, completing tasks, or depositing BNB.

title: How to deposit BNB?
content: Go to the Deposit page and send a unique amount to the shown address. After confirmation, your balance is updated.

title: How to become VIP?
content: VIPs enjoy bonuses and early access. You can buy VIP status with WorkTokens on your dashboard.
